title: Plant seed research provides basis for sustainable alternatives to chemical fertilizers

title_detail.value: Plant seed research provides basis for sustainable alternatives to chemical fertilizers

summary: Scientists assessed the seed microbiomes of two successive plant generations for the first time and discovered that seeds are an important vector for transmission of beneficial endophytes across generations.

summary_detail.value: Scientists assessed the seed microbiomes of two successive plant generations for the first time and discovered that seeds are an important vector for transmission of beneficial endophytes across generations.
